attributes.action: Let boys in uk schools wear shorts
attributes.background: It is unfair girls are allowed to wear skirts and boys cant wear shorts

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Require schools to have appropriate uniform rules for hot weather: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/639484

Require schools allow students to wear shorts and tracksuits: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/639558
